page.title: 20Pipeline Thro' Collingbourne
page.content: The farmland around Collingbourne Kingston and Everleigh was temporarily disturbed for a few months in 1985 whilst the Esso Petroleum Co, Ltd., had a new pipeline installed. The pipeline starts at Fawley Refinery in Southampton and finishes at Seisdon near Wolverhampton, a distance of approx. 130 miles. The 14" diameter pipe was laid some 4\ feet below the surface of the ground and will be used to carry petrol, diesel oil and aviation kerosine. Within a matter of weeks the scar_line across the countryside started to heal and the only reminders of anything foreign to the earth is there, are the marker posts alongside roads which cross the pipeline.
